Uses of Class
view.userInterface.Button

Packages that use Button
Package
Description
controller.contextControllers
Package containing controller classes related to Contexts (game situations) , every context controller can update and draw his own situation.
view.userInterface
Package containing view classes related to User Interface, here you can find customized buttons and the music player.

    Description
    void
    GenericContext.selectButton(Button[] buttons, int index)
    Sets buttons[index] button as selected and the other as not.
